# allowsSpellCheck

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether to allow spell check during an assessment.

## Declaration

```swift
var allowsSpellCheck: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

Users can activate the spell checker by turning on the Check Spelling feature in the Settings app (General > Keyboard). An assessment session disables spell checking by default, but you can allow it by setting [doc://com.apple.automaticassessmentconfiguration/documentation/AutomaticAssessmentConfiguration/AEAssessmentConfiguration/allowsSpellCheck] to `true` in the [doc://com.apple.automaticassessmentconfiguration/documentation/AutomaticAssessmentConfiguration/AEAssessmentConfiguration] instance that you use to initialize a session.

## Allowing corrections

- **autocorrectMode**: A Boolean value that indicates whether to allow Autocorrect during an assessment.
- **AEAssessmentConfiguration.AutocorrectMode**: The set of autocorrect features that you can enable during an assessment.
